meta.title: Education First - Cambridge Open Language Database

writing.text: After some time, the affection between them is progressing well. John's personality deeply moved Isabella. So Isabella decided to break up with Tom and fell in love with John. John also feeled that Isabella was the woman he loved deeply. To his joy, he could find his true love during his travel. In the end, they married together.

An e-ticket is a provement that you bought the ticket. You can print it from you computer. It's important that you must take your passport. Before you get on the airplane, the customs office will ask you some questions, such as "where are you from" and "what's your purpose to the USA" etc. Then the security office will check in your luggage. You can't bring things like knives and liquids etc.

From:xxx@1234.com To:Herman xxx@1234.com Date:Friday,Nov25,2009 10:00AM Dear Herman Walpool, I am very glad to accept and successfully completed the task. According to your request, I drew up the company's dress code, the concrete content as follows: Men can only wear a suit and tie, the color of a suit must be blue and black.You can't wear jack and jeans and wear a hat and slippers. Women can wear a suit, the color of a suit must be white and blue. You can't wear skirts and tight clothes. Jewellery can't be allowed. All the dress fabrics pfefer cotton to silk or nylon Yours truly, Daniel
Hi Anna ,How are you . My name's Jayla . My telephone number is ########.

Dear Ms Thomas, There are thirty pens and fifteen pencils in the office. Also, there are twelve desks and fourteen chairs and thirteen computers and sixteen keyboard and sixteen headphones and one table. Good Bay!
Hi! My name's Jayla. I'm thirty-four years old. I'm from Xian,in China. Nice to meet you . Bye!

writing.topic: Describing your family in an email
writing.text: Hi! My name is Jayla. I'm thirty-four. I'm from china.I live in Xi An with my husband. There are seven people in my famliy:my mother,my father,my husband and his father and his mother.
Hi ! My name is Jayla. I am thirty-four years old. I am from China. I live in the XI AN. I work in the officer. I am a businessman.I like my job.

writing.topic: Signing up for a dating website
writing.text: Name: Jayla Age:34 Hair Color: black Eye Color:browm Describe youerself:I am tall and thin.I have long black hair and big browm eyes. I have tattoo. I am young and happy!
